name: portworx-confluent-kafka
description:
Apache Kafka by Confluent using Portworx volumes

	Documentation: https://docs.portworx.com/scheduler/mesosphere-dcos/kafka.html
preInstallNotes:
Default configuration requires 3 agent nodes each with: 1.0 CPU | 4096 MB MEM | 15000 MB Disk

Portworx should be installed on the Private Agents to be able to provision volumes.
postInstallNotes:
Apache Kafka by Confluent using Portworx volumes is being installed.

	Documentation: https://docs.portworx.com/scheduler/mesosphere-dcos/kafka.html
postUninstallNotes:
Apache Kafka by Confluent is being uninstalled.

For DC/OS versions from 1.10 no further action is required. For older DC/OS versions follow the instructions at https://docs.portworx.com/scheduler/mesosphere-dcos/framework_cleanup.html to remove any persistent state if required.
